ca.uwaterloo.crysp.otr

Class InBuf

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uwaterloo.crysp.otr.InBuf

  • public class InBuf
extends java.lang.Object
    Manage input from byte arrays.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      InBuf(byte[] buf)
      Initialize an OutBuf with a given array
      InBuf(byte[] buf, int off, int len)
      Initialize an OutBuf with a given piece of an array
      InBuf(java.lang.String input)
      Initialize an OutBuf with the decoded contents of the Base64 input.

      • InBuf

        public InBuf(java.lang.String input)
        Initialize an OutBuf with the decoded contents of the Base64 input. The input string should start with "OTR?:", followed by the base64 encoded data, ends with ".".
        Parameters:
        input - Base 64 encoded input.
